name: Hellhole Island
description:
You find yourself stranded on a dangerous island, with some handy tools. Can you survive until help arrives?

Explore the area, fight powerful bosses, and obtain gear in this survival game inspired by titles such as Minecraft, Muck or Terraria.

Features:

  • Plenty of building blocks to bring your ideas to life.
  • A lot of weapons, both melee and ranged.
  • User map system that allows to share your creations with almost 8 billion people on planet earth.
  • Survival mode, the standard survival experience.
  • Creative mode, which gives you unlimited access to every single item in the game.
  • Hardcore mode, for an extra challenge.
  • Hellhole mode, for an even BIGGER challenge. (Activated by typing in "easy mode" as world seed)
  • A hopefully good soundtrack.
